content: this crochet pattern is for an amigurumi capybara with accessories the crochet pattern includes instructions for a capybara plushie a turtle backpack a flamingo rubber ring and a strawberry this pattern is easy skill level the english pattern is written in usa terminology you will need to know basic crochet stitches increases and decreases there is very minimal sewing involved and some basic tapestry the pattern is 12 pages long and includes gauge information progress photos and finished sizes ⭐️ sizes ⭐️ capybara height 23cm x circumference 32cm turtle backpack length 13cm x width 10cm rubber ring diameter 17cm x height 11cm strawberry height 8cm x circumference 20cm ⭐️ supplies you will need ⭐️ 8mm crochet hook super bulky yarn toy stuffing black embroidery thread tape measure sewing needle scissors ⭐️ yarn ⭐️ weight super chunky / super bulky / #6 brand recommendation bernat baby blanket or yarnsmith snug as a bug a brown 15 yards b beige 67 yards c black 9 yards d green 15 yards e lime 20 yards f pink 40 yards g red 9 yards total 175 yards due to the nature of the product no refunds will be issued free basic online version available at https //hookfully com/free-capybara-crochet-pattern-with-accessories-turtle-backpack-flamingo-rubber-ring-and-strawberry/
